rules_text:
When Golna, the First Shah enters, create Shir, a legendary 3/3 white Cat creature token with trample.
Monument {5}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Creatures you control have trample, haste, and hexproof.
{2}{G}{G}: Create a 2/2 white Cat creature token.
flavor_text2:
[i]“All Shahs since have claimed the legacy of Golna the loving, who guarded the cities and built wonders for his people.”
—[/i]The Tale of Kings[i][/i]
